CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [12][13][14][15][16][17][18] As one of the most promising building blocks for constructing low band - gap conjugated polymers , diketopyrrolopyrrole ( DPP ) has emerged as the desirable electron - withdrawing moiety.

Let's think step by step.

1. The first material name entity in the paragraph is "low band-gap conjugated polymers."
2. The second material name entity is "diketopyrrolopyrrole (DPP)."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap conjugated polymers |
| Diketopyrrolopyrrole (DPP) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [12][13][14][15][16][17][18] As one of the most promising building blocks for constructing low band - gap conjugated polymers , diketopyrrolopyrrole ( DPP ) has emerged as the desirable electron - withdrawing moiety.

Let's think step by step.

1. "low band-gap" (describes a property of conjugated polymers)
2. "desirable" (describes a property of diketopyrrolopyrrole as an electron-withdrawing moiety)

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "low band-gap" and "desirable".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "low band-gap" (refers to the property of a material, specifically conjugated polymers)

Therefore, the only "Property Value" entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to the Value of Material Property is "low band-gap".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
